The stand holds each board apart, allowing air to circulate for even drying, and includes non-slip feet on the base. Board sizes: small 7½ x 11¼ inches; medium 7⅞ x 11⅞ inches; large 8¼ x 12½ inches. Set dimensions: 8½ inches H x 12½ inches W x 2½ inches D boards are dishwasher safe. Stand: wipe clean with damp cloth.

name: Plastic Cutting Board Set of 3-Cutting Boards for Kitchen BPA Free, Large-Small Chopping Boards Non-Slip for Cooking Camping Dishwasher Safe, Reversible, with Grip Handle, 15"×10"×0.6" Green
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY AND DURABLE: THETCHRY plastic cutting boards for kitchen is made of high-quality food-grade plastic, which is safe and healthy. And the surface of the cutting board is tough enough to withstand chopping, slicing and dicing various foods. Even after long-term use and repeated washing, it will not bend or break, and can be used by you and your family for a long time. THREE SIZES FOR YOUR CUTTING NEED: Are you still worried about cross-contamination of food when preparing meals? Use different sizes or colors of THETCHRY large-small cutting board set to easily solve this problem: Large 15"×10" can be used to cut meat and fish, medium 11"×8" can be used to cut various vegetables and fruits, and small 9"×6" can be used to cut onions, peppers or others. Easily meet all your kitchen needs! EASY TO CLEAN AND CONVENIENT USE: Our kitchen chopping boards are BPA-free, so they can be directly put into the dishwasher after use. Or wash them by hand with soap as your needed to easily remove stains. Each green cutting board is equipped with a triangular handle for easy access and storage, and can also be hung in your camper or truck for use. DOUBLE-SIDED REVERSIBLE, DOUBLE ANTI-SLIP: Our kitchen set is equipped with high-quality rubber anti-slip feet on both sides to fix the cutting board on the kitchen countertop. No matter which side you use, the BPA-free cutting boards is stable and safe. In addition, one side is designed with a unique anti-slip particle area. Whether it is cutting raw meat or fish, there is no pressure, making cutting easier and safer! MULTIPLE SCENES, MULTIPLE USES: The THETCHRY non-slip plastic cutting board weighs only 2.3 pounds, and you can easily take it anywhere. Not only can it be used at home, in an apartment or college dorm, you can also take it out, and you can even take it to an RV and use it for picnics and camping with your family. I believe that using this cutting board set will allow you to have a good time! PROFESSIONAL BRAND SERVICE: THETCHRY is a long-time supplier to well-known large offline retail supermarkets, we are committed to providing our customers with a safe and efficient kitchen experience and the best customer support. If you have any questions please feel free to come and ask us, we provide 24/7 customer support to solve all your needs.

name: Plastic Cutting Boards for Kitchen, 3-Piece Large Cutting Board Set Dishwasher Safe Chopping Boards with Non-slip Feet and Juice Grooves, Kikcoin
short_description: KITCHEN NECESSITIES - 3 pieces of plastic cutting boards for kitchen of various sizes will meet all your kitchen needs, Large cutting board (15.0"x10.5") suitable for carving a turkey or cutting steak; Medium cutting board (12.0"x9.0") suitable for vegetables; Small cutting board (10"x7") suitable for fruit. NON-SLIP - We all know raw meat and fish can be slippery, and an overly smooth cutting board surface can worsen matters. So we designed a unique texture on the plastic surface that keeps sliding food stationary during cutting, making the cutting extraordinarily easy. RUBBER FEET - This chopping board set also has rubber feet that keep the board gripped to the surface. The soft edges also long-lasting as handles, so you can easily transport your food from the kitchen prep station to the stove without worry. DEEP JUICE GROOVE - One side of the meat cutting board has a juice groove for catching liquids from meats, while the other is totally flat, ideal for cutting fruits and vegetables. EASY TO WASH - Thick and sturdy enough that will not bend and warp, so these cutting boards both can handwash or dishwasher. NO CLACKING SOUNDS - Our cutting boards are made from high-density plastic and offer shock absorption so there are no loud crackling sounds when cutting. Due to their sturdy construction and wear-resistant surface, they are knife-friendly and keep the blades sharp even after heavy use.
